Song.title: We Will Worship The Lamb Of Glory
Song.copyright: Dennis Jernigan Â© 1989 Shepherd's Heart Music, Inc. (Admin. by PraiseCharts Publishing, Inc.)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [D] We will worship the L[A/D]amb of Glory [G/D] [D] We will worship the K[A]ing of kings [F#7/A#] [Bm9] We will w[D/A]orship the L[E]amb of Glory [G2] We will [Em7/A]worship the K[D]ing [(when into V. 2: G/A)]
Verse 2: [D] We bless the name of the L[A/D]amb of Glory [G/D] [D] We bless the name of the K[A]ing of kings [F#7/A#] [Bm9] We bless the [D/A]name of the L[E]amb of Glory [G2] We bless the [Em7/A]name of the K[D]ing
Chorus: And with our hands lifted h[A]igh We will w[G/A]orship and s[D]ing And with our hands lift[D/F#]ed h[A]igh We come be[G/A]fore You rejoi[D]cing With [Dsus/E]our h[D/F#]ands lifted h[G]igh to the [D/F#]sky When the [A#7]world wonders [Bm9]why We'll just [Em7]tell them we're [Em7/A]loving our K[D]ing [D2/F#] We'll just [Em7]tell them we're [Em7/A]loving our K[D]ing
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 we will worship the lamb of glory we will worship the king of kings we will worship the lamb of glory we will worship the king verse 2 we bless the name of the lamb of glory we bless the name of the king of kings we bless the name of the lamb of glory we bless the name of the king chorus and with our hands lifted high we will worship and sing and with our hands lifted high we come before you rejoicing with our hands lifted high to the sky when the world wonders why well just tell them were loving our king well just tell them were loving our king
